org.swisscheese.swisscheese.game

Class GameFromSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.swisscheese.swisscheese.game.GameFromSettings

  • public class GameFromSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a wrapper class for GameLoop. When an instance of GameFromSettings is created, the GameLoop is started, and the game is displayed on the screen.
    Since:
    2018-12-27, v0.5
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Alex Kalinins

      • GameFromSettings

        private GameFromSettings(GameSettings settings,
                         SaveMetadata metadata,
                         Map map,
                         View... view)
        Private constructor for the game. (Used by public static factories).
        Parameters:
        settings - settings of the game instance.
        metadata - metadata object of the game.
        map - the maze map of the game.
        view - the view from the camera (var-args).
